analysis.Summary: This file is the client‐side entry point for the 'rents' module. It aggregates and re‐exports the module’s store, router, and Vue components, and provides an initialization function to wire everything into the host application.
analysis.Purpose: To bootstrap the renting submodule by registering its Vuex store, defining its routes, and exposing its UI components for use in the main app.

Components.name: storeRenting
Components.responsibility: Holds state, mutations, actions, and getters for rent data management.

Components.name: createRentsRoutes
Components.responsibility: Generates route definitions for rent‐related views.

Components.name: CardRent
Components.responsibility: Displays a single rent item as a card.

Components.name: Rents
Components.responsibility: Main listing page for all rents.

Components.name: GanttChart
Components.responsibility: Displays rent schedules on a Gantt chart.

Components.name: RentsEdit
Components.responsibility: Form page for creating or editing a rent entry.

Functions.name: initializeRenting
Functions.description: Registers the renting routes under specified parent routes and adds the renting store to the application.

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: The root Vue or application instance.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: The central store manager (e.g., Vuex or Martyrs store).

parameters.name: router
parameters.description: The router instance to which new routes will be added.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Optional settings, including a custom parent route name.

analysis.Usage: Imported either as the default ModuleRenting or via named exports. Typically used in the main application bootstrap: import ModuleRenting from 'modules/rents/rents.client.js'; then call ModuleRenting.initialize(app, store, router, options).
Notes: Default route parent is 'Home' unless overridden via options.route.
Also registers a second route branch under 'Backoffice Root'.
Exports both the aggregate ModuleRenting object and all sub‐components/functions for flexible import patterns.
